#Awesome April Offers - Unmetered IPv4!

##Roubaix; France

**RBX-128 | $6/year with "fool14-6"**<br />
128mb Guaranteed RAM, 5GB HDD, 1 Core,<br />
20 Ports on Shared NAT IPv4, 5 IPv6,<br />
100mbs Unmetered Fair Share Port (DDoS Protected)

**RBX-256 | $10/year with "fool14-10"**<br />
256mb Guaranteed RAM, 15GB HDD, 1 Core, <br />
20 Ports on Shared NAT IPv4, 5 IPv6, <br />
100mbs Unmetered Fair Share Port (DDoS Protected)

**[Order IPv6 VPS in Roubaix](https://i-83.net/account/cart.php?gid=6)**

##Paris, France - Limited Stock

**PAR-256 | $5/month with "fool14-5"**<br />
256mb Guaranteed RAM, 10GB HDD, 1 Core,<br />
IPv4 - Gigabit Unmetered Fair Share Port

**PAR-512 | $7/month with "fool14-7"**<br />
512mb Guaranteed RAM, 30GB HDD, 2 Core,<br />
IPv4 - Gigabit Unmetered Fair Share Port

**[Order IPv4 VPS in Paris](https://i-83.net/account/cart.php?gid=12)**

###Software Information:

We run Proxmox not SolusVM; allowing your whole VPS to be managed using our interface in your account area; no separate login portals or details to remember.

###Datacenter Information:

FR: Roubaix - OVH (DDoS protected)<br />
- Test IP: 188.165.12.106<br />
- 100mb DL: http://188.165.12.106/files/100Mio.dat

FR: Paris - Iliad DC2
- Ping/DL: http://www.as12876.net/test.iso

####Hardware Information:

E3-1220/E3-1225/E3-1240
Raid 1/Raid 10
16/32GB RAM

####DNS:

Free redundant DNS accounts are available on our website for use with your domain, have your DNS available in different continents to prevent any DNS connectivity issues causing your site to be offline.

####No Overselling:

Our Nodes are not oversold - You get your allotted specification, there whenever and however you want to use it.

####Additional IP's:

IPv4 available in Paris, not available on Roubaix product range.

####Support:

These are unmanaged VPS servers but our ticket desk is manned 7 days a week.

####Billing:

We only accept PayPal payments. Services will be activated upon payment receipt following a Fraud Check. Payments will be made in £ via PayPal. Voucher Codes are set to price override and are calculated using the exchange rate at the time of post: 1.67.

####Nothing take your fancy?

We have a range of products and services on our website to choose from [cPanel Hosting](https://i-83.net/shared-hosting/) to our [Content Delivery Network](https://i-83.net/content-delivery-network/), feel free to look there and see if we can meet your needs!
